attributes.action: take proper responsibility for the careless loss of 25 million people’s personal child benefit data including address details for almost all 'At Risk' children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Brown, your apology for this unprecedented breach of public trust at least confirms that your government is responsible.
You must now take action to sack the responsible ministers and in addition consider your own position.
You and your successors must realise and take seriously your grave responsibility to protect the personal data of this country’s citizens, and this must be demonstrated by resignations or sackings. In this instance the ‘no blame’ culture is simply not acceptable.
This unforgivable incident has potentially exposed the address details of all the 'At Risk' children in this country. 
Furthermore the government must guarantee compensation to those families that now have to relocate for the security of their children.
